Error: no output directory provided Error: --letter provided but no --letter-template was provided Error: no output directory provided Error: --email provided but no --email-template was provided Error: no output directory provided Benton, John B Jr. James Butt 6649 N Blue Gum St, New Orleans, Orleans, LA, 70116 (jbutt@gmail.com)
Dear James Butt,
Similarly, we also have a template for the company's letter: James Butt 6649 N Blue Gum St, New Orleans, Orleans, LA, 70116 (jbutt@gmail.com)
Dear James Butt, As you may have heard or read, last month we learned that criminals forced their way into our systems, and stole information about our customers. Late last week, as part of our ongoing investigation, we learned that the taken information includes names, mailing addresses, phone numbers or email addresses.
I am writing to make you aware that your name, mailing address, phone number or email address may have been taken during the intrusion.
I am truly sorry this incident occurred, and I sincerely regret any inconvenience it may cause you.
Because we value you as a customer, and because your trust is important to us, our company is offering you one year of free credit monitoring through Experian’s ProtectMyID product, which includes identity theft insurance where available. Enclosed please find your additional information about your free credit card monitoring.
You can find additional information and FAQs about this incident at our website. If you have further questions, you may call us at 866-852-8680.
Thank you for your patience and your loyalty.
Sincerely, Insurance Company CEO
